topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2d9bd6368724354aa3500#post_54e2d9bd6368724354aa3500
I actually have no idea. You'd probably have to ask them or someone around that knows.


"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2da2b63687246a3f91100#post_54e2da2b63687246a3f91100
Its true, Boom really shat the bed at what it wanted to be and that was everything, but nothing. 

Plus it destroyed A LOT of things people liked about the sonic games Gameplay wise.

And though its ironic the game plays amazingly _*slow*_. Seriously this is probably the slowest I have seen Sonic go. Where as most of the other games like to show you that sonic is indeed FAST.

When Tails knuckles and Amy are literally running and keeping up with sonic at the same speed you know something is up. 

The other thing is that the games world seems super empty. Like there is just nothing there. And then once again I have to say this game has NO MUSIC AT ALL.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2d5066368726f82e10f00#post_54e2d5066368726f82e10f00
Both are terrible on their own and in their own rights.

However, Sonic Boom could be consider objectively worse, because one of Sonic 06's few saving graces was its great soundtrack. Sonic Boom's soundtrack is so forgettable and vanilla you can't even taste the vanilla. 

Yes, I'm defending Sonic 06 over Sonic Boom. The only thing(s) good about Sonic Boom are the TV Show (to an extent) and maybe the Archie Comic adaptations. And the Knuckles Jump glitch.

topics.body:
"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2dd856368720f17650c00#post_54e2dd856368720f17650c00
Its one of those problems some if not most AAA games have now a days.

The Developers are told to make game, they take their time making it, and then literally a month later the Publishers tell them *"NO YOU GUYS GOING TO SLOW, FINISH GAME NOW UNTIL THIS DEADLINE"* and then the Developers that were taking their time have to rush an unfinished game out.

(Though if Boom was finished I still think it wouldn't be good)
